Posts.Content: Hi Pearldrops, I’ve been on zoladex for 7 weeks now and just last week came out in these red itchy spots on my arms, legs, feet, shoulders and wrists. GP said I’ve taken a reaction to something and gave me antihistamine tablets and steroid cream. Had to stop the cream as it’s burning my skin which is still sensitive after chemo. My oncologist told me she has seen it happpen with people on letrozole. I’m not sure what to do. Can’t stay on antihistamine forever I’m about to start radiotherapy next week... all these side effects getting me down too Â  I hope you get something to help ... hugs xx
Posts.Title: Rash after letrozole
